children.header: Ritual for the time of death
Bon subjugation (of negative forces that disturb the dead)

nested_captions.content: Death ritual includes rituals performed prior to death, during the dying process, and after death.

summaries.content: Rituals for dealing with death represent one of the most diverse classes of Tibetan ritual. This category includes rituals performed prior to death (preparing for death, predicting the signs of death, and so forth), during the dying process (helping the consciousness escape from the body, guiding the dying person to a favorable rebirth, preventing evil spirits from interfering with the soul of the deceased, and so forth), and after death (funerary rituals, commemorations of the deceased, and rituals for the benefit of the deceased).
